Package org.xbmc.eventclient

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ButtonCodes
    Remote control and keyboard strings, taken from xbmc/ButtonTranslator.cpp
    EventClient
    XBMC Event Client Class Implements an XBMC-Client.
    EventClient.PingThread
    Implements a PingThread which tells XBMC EventServer that the Client is alive (this should be done at least every 60 seconds!
    Packet
    XBMC Event Client Class
    PacketACTION
    XBMC Event Client Class An ACTION packet tells XBMC to do the action specified, based on the type it knows were it needs to be sent.
    PacketBUTTON
    XBMC Event Client Class A button packet send a key press or release event to XBMC
    PacketBYE
    XBMC Event Client Class A BYE packet terminates the connection to XBMC.
    PacketHELO
    XBMC Event Client Class A HELO packet establishes a valid connection to XBMC.
    PacketLOG
    XBMC Event Client Class A LOG packet tells XBMC to log the message to xbmc.log with the loglevel as specified.
    PacketMOUSE
    XBMC Event Client Class A MOUSE packets sets the mouse position in XBMC
    PacketNOTIFICATION
    XBMC Event Client Class This packet displays a notification window in XBMC.
    PacketPING
    XBMC Event Client Class A PING packet tells XBMC that the client is still alive.
